recipe_ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces,   1 tbsp olive oil,   1 onion, sliced,   2 carrots, sliced,   2 bell peppers (different colors), sliced,   1 cup broccoli florets,   2 cloves garlic, minced,   1/4 cup kosher soy sauce (or tamari),   2 tbsp honey,   1 tbsp cornstarch,   1/4 cup water,   Cooked rice, for serving
recipe_instruction: In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, cornstarch, and water. Set aside.
